__e: Someone who's been with you that long, couldn't you trust me just a little,
We had a big fight about him hiding this, and I told him if he wasn't ready to trust me, that... that we shouldn't talk for a while, so I guess he wasn't ready,
And to think I told your mom you could be trusted, mostly 'cause I wanted to watch the game.
To think that for the first time since she was a child, she was actually beginning to trust you.
We had to do this to be sure we could trust you.
We had a big fight about him hiding this, and I told him if he wasn't ready to trust me, that... that we shouldn't talk for a while, so I guess he wasn't ready,
I know this is really hard and I'm sorry, but you're just going to have to trust us on this.
I also know it's very hard to trust anyone in this world being... one of us.
You should leave immediately. I am her only confidante. And you're the only one the confidence I can.
The one thing that an operative and a handler need is trust, and I can't trust you.
She needs someone to trust, and it looks like that's you.
Ah, because old friends can be hard to trust.
I told her over and over, boys will take advantage.
I wouldn't even trust your own memories on this.
Stop. Get him out of here. Everything you touched is tainted.
You taught me the most important thing on this job is trusting your partner.
But if a man can't trust his wife...
It's your job not to trust people.
And, as we can see, my mother was quite right not to trust my father's side of the family.
You never, never trust the people that you love!
Don't you know it's dangerous to trust people you don't know very well?
For a long time after that, she had real trouble trusting people...
